personal.name: This Website!
personal.summary: My personal website: for recording and sharing my programming accomplishments, both personal and professional.
knowledgeGained: How to define a sensible architecture for a React.js website
How to fully launch a Node.js website, from domain name registration to hosting

personal.name: Cocos2d-x Tiled Framework
personal.summary: Extending utility provided by the Cocos2D-X game development platform, this framework is intended to make 2D Tile-based game development simpler. Included is a simple proof-of-concept game.
knowledgeGained: Best practices for C++ constructors
How to strictly define functions in C++
How to implement simple AI
How to use valgrind to review code for memory leaks

personal.name: Simple Ray Tracer
personal.summary: A raytracing program for rendering three-dimensional scenes.
knowledgeGained: The fundamentals of raytracing
The fundamentals of Makefiles
The fundamentals of Test Driven Development using the Catch testing library

personal.name: String Genetic Algorithm
personal.summary: My favorite pet project - a genetic algorithm - written in C# to familiarize myself with the popular language while exemplifying the power of genetic algorithms for machine learning in an easy-to-visualize format.
knowledgeGained: How to read and write C#.
How to utilize Visual Studio Unit Testing Libraries.

personal.name: Memory Allocator
personal.summary: A memory allocator, similar to that of the standard libraries, written in C.
knowledgeGained: Intimate knowledge of how memory allocation is handled by the computer
How to be proficient with pointers
How to handle garbage collection
How to define structs to take advantage of memory alignment

professional.name: MERN Stack App
professional.summary: A web app platform and API for a large automotive OEM intended to centralize common digital work operations and reduce cost of new, web-ready applications.
knowledgeGained: How to proficiently write and read TypeScript/JavaScript.
How to utilize the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) to develop professional-grade Web Apps.
How to utilize GraphQL to facilitate communication between a client and a server.
How to proficiently create SCSS/CSS styles to beautify a Web App.
achievements: Ability to quickly pick up and competently utilize the technology stack for the project was commended by team lead.
Played an active role in design decisions: researched, reviewed, and wrote detailed reports regarding potential techniques and technologies to accomplish feature goals.
Took on leadership responsibilities: provided strong communication with the client, delegated and accepted tasks according to team strengths, and trained team members on relevant technologies.
achievements_archived: Performed as acting lead developer: communicated directly with customer regarding estimations, issues, and new feature or bug requests; organized and delegated tasks according to team strengths and abilities; trained team members on relevant technologies as the need arose.

Commended by team lead for ability to quickly pick up the necessary skills to competently and confidently complete development tasks related to the project (little prior JavaScript/TypeScript experience).

professional.name: C++ Desktop Simulation Application
professional.summary: A desktop application for a large automotive OEM intended to simulate and evaluate the efficacy of products with minimal risk.
knowledgeGained: How to take advantage of C++17's many useful STL additions.
How to utilize Google's C++ testing and mocking framework.
How to use Qt's libraries for simple and fast XML parsing.
How to utilize the principle of separation of responsibilities to keep code clean and robust.
How to use Test Driven Development to develop maintainable code.
achievements: Communicated effectively with an international team of developers to achieve project goals.
